author: pozzobon
body:
The fork involves 6 packages

Geometry/TrackerGeometryBuilder (_)
DataFormats/L1TrackTrigger (_)
L1Trigger/TrackTrigger (_)
L1Trigger/TrackFindingTracklet
L1Trigger/TrackFindingAM
SimTracker/TrackTriggerAssociation (_)

BUT my pull request is meant ONLY for the following ones:

Geometry/TrackerGeometryBuilder
DataFormats/L1TrackTrigger
L1Trigger/TrackTrigger
SimTracker/TrackTriggerAssociation

as the other two are only test packages...

Thank you!
Nicola
title: Track trigger np 20131202 dsv
